title: 2021-04-28 - EU Cyber Operations Groups
plain_text:
# EU Cyber Operations Groups

**[xorl.wordpress.com/2021/04/28/eu-cyber-operations-groups/](https://xorl.wordpress.com/2021/04/28/eu-cyber-operations-groups/)**

[leave a comment »](https://xorl.wordpress.com/2021/04/28/eu-cyber-operations-groups/#respond)


April 28, 2021


And after [Russia,](https://xorl.wordpress.com/2021/04/16/russias-cyber-operations-groups/) [US,](https://xorl.wordpress.com/2021/04/18/us-cyber-operations-groups/) [China and](https://xorl.wordpress.com/2021/04/20/chinese-cyber-operations-groups/) [DPRK (North Korea), here is the one for APT groups](https://xorl.wordpress.com/2021/04/24/north-korea-dprk-cyber-operations-groups/)
associated with European Union (EU) nation-states. A big disclaimer here that I know that
many more nation-states might be operating offensive cyber operations groups, but I only
included those for which there has been some publicly known reporting associated with
them.

If you think I got something wrong or there are more groups that I’m missing, please let me
know and I’ll update the diagram as soon as possible.

Just like in the previous cases, the sources and changes log are available under the
diagram.

_Last update: 07 September 2021_


-----

-----

**Sources**

**ChangeLog**

Version 2.0 (07 Sep. 2021): Added BKA (NSO Group customer for Pegasus spyware)
Version 1.5 (28 April 2021): Update DGSE/STR name based on the 2012 legislation

Version 1.0 (28 April 2021): First publication.
